forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a high near 29. North wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 10pm. Cloudy, with a low around 20. Northwest wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Boston, a thick blanket of clouds drapes the city, casting the morning in muted shades of gray. The air feels crisp, with a hint of chill that permeates the atmosphere, as the temperature hovers near twenty-nine degrees. The north wind whispers gently, nudging leaves and sending a quiet shake through the trees. Clarity is just out of reach; a fog softens the horizon, veiling the skyline in a shroud of mystery.  

Today’s narrative begins under this cloudy cloak, with a slow shift anticipated as a chance of snow sneaks in after the evening settles. The forecast suggests a tantalizing possibility of soft, white flakes descending upon the city, adding a layer of magic to the evening. For those seeking solace from the cold, a cozy sweater layered beneath a warm coat will serve well against the brisk winds. Warm footwear is recommended, perhaps a reliable pair of boots ready to crunch upon the first traces of snow, should it materialize. As the day unfolds, one might find comfort within a local café, savoring a steaming cup of coffee or a fragrant tea while watching the world outside transform. A stroll along the tree-lined streets could yield moments of quiet introspection, the kind only a gray day can evoke, reminding us that even amidst the clouds, beauty endures.
